name: HCVRNATest
title: HCV RNA Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Laboratory Tests.),(Data Element Scope: Hepatitis C virus nucleic (RNA) test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hepatitis C virus antibody test performed using laboratory methods for identifying nucleic material and on serum/plasma specimen.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hepatitis C virus nucleic (RNA) tests performed on specimen types other than blood or serum/plasma.)
